item.title: Long Term Project - Video Editor/ Compilations to Compile Visuals/ Minor Animations required - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
I'm looking for a long term article video editor who can compile clips and images to match a script that we provide related to the following topics:
Artificial Intelligence, AI Tools,  AI Trends. Robotics

Video editor should be able to do the following:
* Speak fluent English
* Communicate effectively
* Turn around time in 3 days or less
* Be creative and humorous
* MUST be able to edit a MINIMUM of at least 2 videos a week.

If you have read the middle of this job descp., please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.

As you can tell, I am looking for the long term video editor and do have high expectations, but keep in mind, this will be consistent daily work if you are able to provide and this will be compensated quite well.  We have been working with 2 video editors already for 2+ months but we need more to join our team!

Again, we will be providing the script and voiceover, we will simply need visuals for it and for it to be put together nicely and creatively with some slight animations (i.e. for the title screens)

So for the first type of video, here is what we’re looking for very similar to: https://youtu.be/PG8vu0i5juY?si=JI9REYDnOAMmq7J5

TAKE NOTE how it has the following:
-THE BEGINNING OF THE VIDEO- Show a clip that is EXTREMELY relevant to the title, essentially a clip with audio (OPTIONAL: only do this if you understand the niche)
-Show the numbers with appeal and emphasis; if it’s not a countdown script, show the subheadings
-Video editor will need to find 3 types of visuals: clips w/ audio, clips w/o audio, and images
-All visuals can be ripped but should never last longer than 6 seconds
-Entire video should be greater than 8 minutes unless otherwise indicated
-Background music should be copyright free
-Show AT LEAST 1 clip with audio every minute afterwards

This is our GUIDELINE that we follow across all our videos.

Here are more examples of videos we need done similar to:
a) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BbYv7-7LvlQ
b) https://youtu.be/GiKvPJSOUmE?si=ZwCDaLJxYZubRpld
c) https://youtu.be/G43NGGreumk?si=kxmZ_OOz756aXm12
d) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wPWaHOKY07Y

Additional Questions:
1. Are you okay with the rate of $160 for 8 videos?
2. How many videos can you handle per week?
3. To the best of your understanding, can you rephrase what kind of video I am seeking?
4. You will be instantly hired if you created a top 10 or faceless youtube videos before. Have you created one?

Budget: $160
Posted On: June 16, 2024 11:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Animation
Country: IND
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor YouTube Channel World War 2 - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, we are in search of a professional and experienced video editor for our youtube channel about WW2.  

The requirements are:
- Video length around 10-12 minutes.
- 4 videos produced per month.
- You must have experience with the WW2 niche
- You must have access to the right stock footage with footage from WW2.

When posting your proposal add 'WW2" to the top to let us know that you actually read the whole job post and understand the requirements.

Budget is $200 per video, negotiable for higher pay for proven work of high quality and results based on our collaboration.

Please add your portfolio. Without a portfolio we won't review your application.


Budget: $800
Posted On: June 16, 2024 11:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Development, Explainer Video, Education, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Development, Explainer Video, Education, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Help with a very small tweak to an imovie for school project - needed immediately - Upwork
item.description:
We have an imovie recorded and a video screen recording of the accompanying slides for a short webinar (school project).  We just need to execute a picture in picture.  It should take no more than 5 minutes, we are just stuck.
Needed immeidately - ie. within next 2 hours.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editor for E-commerce Direct Response Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating e-commerce direct response ads. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of terms like hook and call to action and be able to effectively utilize them in the ad creation process. The main focus of this role will be to create engaging and persuasive video ads that drive conversions and sales.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and optimize video content for e-commerce direct response ads
  - Incorporate hooks and call to action to drive viewers' engagement
  - Ensure seamless transitions, high-quality visuals, and compelling storytelling

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in video editing and e-commerce direct response ads
  - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and CAPCUT
  - Strong understanding of sales and marketing principles
  - Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you're passionate about creating impactful video ads that generate results, we'd love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work along with your application.


Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editing for Birthday Party Footage - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a professional video from approximately 1 hour of birthday party footage. The goal is to highlight the best moments, add music, transitions, and make the video engaging and visually appealing. The video should capture the essence of the celebration and be suitable for sharing with family and friends.
   
   Required skills:
   - Video editing
   - Creative storytelling
   - Music selection and synchronization
   - Transitions and effects
   
   We need someone who has a keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and the ability to meet deadlines. The ideal candidate should have prior experience in editing event videos and a portfolio showcasing their work.
   
   This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Budget: $45
Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Country: Bermuda
click to apply

item.title: Youtube clips needed - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone to help me find videos of trail camera strange clips, cyptids on camera, animal encounters and strange/interesting things caught on camera in nature. You can see this channels to understand what clips I am looking for:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiGC6ffdbnD1uOdttoVmbWQ

These clips need to be the original unedited footage and NOT from videos companies like ViralHog.

I will need 30 clips per assignment.
!! I will be asking for replacements for clips that have been used before in other videos or if they aren't any good. Only apply if you are ok with revisions.!!

If you are doing a good job this is a longer position.

Please send a sample of 2 chosen clips in your application message to see if you understand what kind of clips I am looking for.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.description:

www.youtube.com/@smarttechus
www.youtube.com/@AgricultureTechUS

If you have experience in editing videos in the architectural tech YouTube niche, feel free to apply and let's talk more details!

Sam
